definitions.definition: A flat or roughly flat strip on the neck of a stringed instrument, against which the strings are pressed to shorten the vibrating length and produce notes of higher pitches.
A miniature skateboard or snowboard that is propelled by the fingers .
Synonym of hangboard ( “ device for building finger strength ” ) .

main_definition: ( music , lutherie ) A flat or roughly flat strip on the neck of a stringed instrument, against which the strings are pressed to shorten the vibrating length and produce notes of higher pitches.
secondary_definitions: A miniature skateboard or snowboard that is propelled by the fingers .
Synonym of hangboard ( “ device for building finger strength ” ) .
